definition[0]_en: A colour content that consists of tones of one colour, or black and white, or black or white and another colour.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A colour content that consists of tones of one colour, or black and white, or black or white and another colour.

definition[0]_en: A colour content that consists of two colours, neither of which is black or white, or more than two colours.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A colour content that consists of two colours, neither of which is black or white, or more than two colours.
